content: sheena giraffe & her kid by halime özel @handmade_by_halime dear crochet lover much love time and effort have been put into designing this amigurumi and i would appreciate if you please give credit to me and add the following note to your item pattern by @handmade_by_halime this pattern is for free but that still means that you can not publish this pattern in any social media channel and youtube even if it s for free and you tagged me the pattern should only be available in my ravelry account that you can not mass-produce it and sell it in stores it is for personal use only that you can not reproduce the pattern and sell it as your own that you can not alternate some parts and because of that claim it as your pattern and publish it you can not translate to other language and publish it on your social media i m more than happy if you as a private person to gift or sell any items made from this pattern but always credit me as the designer please follow these simple steps as respect to me as the designer i give away this pattern for free but i still own the copyrights for it happy crocheting with love and respect halime dear crochet lover thank you so much for purchasing the i m more than happy for you to gift or sell pattern of sheena giraffe and her kid any items made from this pattern but would i hope that you will enjoy crochet them as love if you could credit me as a designer much as i loved designing them never hesitate to contact me through my much love time and effort have been put instagram account and i will do my best to into designing these amigurumi creations and help you i would appreciate if you do not share this pdf reproduce alterate or sell this pattern enjoy this pattern either in its entirety or in parts this pattern is with love for personal use only halime i would love to see your finished creation so please give credit to me and add following note to your item pattern by @handmade_by_halime 2 additional information abbreviations you can either attach the legs and arms for sheena chain chain/s giraffe with security joints or make them moveable slip_stitch slip_stitch with yarn there are step by step images after the single_crochet single_crochet assembly chapter if you don t want to make the legs half_double_crochet h alf double_crochet and arms moveable it works fine just to sew them to double_crochet double_crochet the body increase i ncrease crochet 2 single_crochet in the same for the kid it is better to sew the legs and arms directly to the body not moveable stitch decrease d ecrease crochet 2 single_crochet together i recommend to look/read through the whole pattern st stitch es and make decision regarding legs and arms before you start crochet round round s … x x r epeat instructions
